systemWilds.name: System Wildcard
systemWilds.description: Can be played as either a Pink or Orange system.

systemWilds.name: System Wildcard
systemWilds.description: Can be played as either a Red or Yellow system.

systemWilds.name: System Wildcard
systemWilds.description: Can be played as either a Brown or Cyan system.

systemWilds.name: System Wildcard
systemWilds.description: Can be played as either a Cyan system or a Hyperlane.

systemWilds.name: System Wildcard
systemWilds.description: Can be played as either a Green or Dark Blue system.

systemWilds.name: System Wildcard
systemWilds.description: Can be played as either a Resource Node or a Hyperlane.

systemWilds.name: Omni-Sector Wildcard
systemWilds.description: This card can be part of any system set. It has no monetary value.

commands.name: Hostile Takeover
commands.description: Steal a full set of systems from any player.

commands.name: Shields Up
commands.description: Cancel any command card played against you.

commands.name: Pirate Raid
commands.description: Steal any single system from another player (cannot be from a completed set).

commands.name: Forced Trade
commands.description: Force another player to trade one of their systems for one of yours.

commands.name: Bounty Hunter
commands.description: Force any one player to pay you 5M Credits.

commands.name: Trade Dividend
commands.description: All players must pay you 2M Credits.

commands.name: Explore a New Sector
commands.description: Draw 2 extra cards from the deck.

commands.name: Space Station
commands.description: Add 3M Credits to the tribute value of a completed system set. Can only be played on a full set.

commands.name: Starbase
commands.description: Add 4M Credits to the tribute value of a completed system set. Requires a Space Station to be on the set first.

commands.name: Trade Embargo
commands.description: Play with a Tribute card to double the amount owed.

tributes.description: Force one player to pay you tribute for one of your systems.
Charge tribute for all your Brown and Cyan systems.
Charge tribute for all your Pink and Orange systems.
Charge tribute for all your Red and Yellow systems.
Charge tribute for all your Green and Dark Blue systems.
Charge tribute for all your Resource Nodes and Hyperlanes.
